task.title: Preparing the <canvas> and JavaScript
task.shortdesc: This document instructs on how to prepare the proper environment to write a video game with <canvas> and JavaScript.

context.p: To accomplish this goal you will need to:

li.xref: Know how to write in HTML.
Know how to write in JavaScript.

step.cmd: In the HTML document, create a <canvas> element, assigning it an ID, width and height.
In the HTML document, create a <script> element, providing the name of the JavaScript file as the source.
In the JavaScript file, write a variable named canvas that gets the ID assigned to the <canvas> in the HTML document.
In the JavaScript file, write a variable named ctx that gets a 2d drawing context for the variable canvas.
